Texts.Chs: 我想到一个好点子提升磁吸攀附！先进的科学使得磁吸攀附变得更为出色了。
Texts.Eng: I've managed to think of a cool upgrade to the Magnet Grip! I should be able to apply some advanced science to it and really grip with power!

Texts.Chs: 每当我附着在墙上时，能够提高我的防御回复我的能量...另外我还能够使用^green;[W]^reset;或^green;[S]^reset;上下移动。
Texts.Eng: Now, when I grip walls, I should get defensive bonuses and increased energy...sapped right from the material itself! Also, W and S allow me to travel up and down.
